mapper.select: SELECT c.BOOK_ID, c.BOOK_TITLE FROM (USER_TABLE a INNER JOIN BOOK_PLAN_TABLE b ON b.USER_ID = a.USER_ID) INNER JOIN BOOK_TABLE c ON b.BOOK_ID = c.BOOK_ID WHERE a.USER_NAME = #{name} AND b.READ_FLAG = 0 AND b.DELETE_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY b.BOOK_ID ;
